title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows; pull and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; identical API surface to JS client—chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat, and embeddings components with standard LangChain callbacks.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich self-hosted Web UI for Ollama with chat folders, model builder, RAG, user roles, and OpenAI-compat endpoint.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, model management for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Community Node CLI that wraps ollama-js for quick generate/chat commands, repl mode, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU, PVC, and ingress.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and compose snippets for running Ollama in Docker.

title: ollama-chat (Flutter)
summary: Cross-platform Flutter chat app that talks to local Ollama via REST API with markdown rendering and theme switcher.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that delegates threads to local Ollama models with per-channel model override.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama completions to Discord with role-based access and conversation memory.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to pull, run, and test Ollama models inside pipelines with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS micro-service starter with built-in Ollama client, Swagger, and streaming SSE endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-model-list
summary: Official curated list of 100+ ready-to-run models (Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) with sizes and tags.

title: ollama-reddit-community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, custom Modfiles, integrations, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
